name: d3-selection
description: Data-driven DOM manipulation: select elements and join them to data.

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && d3-bundler -n selection -o build/selection.js && uglifyjs build/selection.js -c -m -o build/selection.min.js && rm -f build/selection.zip && zip -j build/selection.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/selection.js build/selection.min.js
